description:
More bloom set = bigger harvest

Monterey® Garden Tomato Blossom Spray is a fast-acting blossom spray that increases bloom set and maximizes fruit yield.

This ready-to-use blossom spray is enriched with essential nutrients to promote healthy flowering and fruit development. It’s 0-0.2-0.08 N-P-K works to improve bloom retention, support fruit growth, and help prevent issues like blossom drop and blossom end rot on tomatoes, cucumbers, strawberries, and more.

Sunday partners with trusted, effective solutions that support your garden’s health and harvest.

sections.product_features:
0-0.2-0.08 N-P-K (nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium) blossom spray
Promotes increased flowering and fruiting
Reduces blossom drop and blossom end rot
Ideal for tomatoes, peppers, squash, cucumbers, eggplants, melons, and other blooming crops
Perfect for outdoor garden use
Safe for use around pets when used as directed
sections.ingredients:
Phosphorus: Supports strong root development and flower production
Potassium: Enhances plant resilience and overall growth
Calcium: Prevents blossom end rot and strengthens cell walls
